title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S.J.Res. 30, S.J.Res. 35, and S.J.Res. 36 into Law â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
April 19, 2017
On Wednesday, April 19, 2017, the President signed into law:S.J.Res. 30, which reappoints Steve Case as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution;S.J.Res. 35, which appoints Michael Govan as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution; andS.J.Res. 36, which appoints Roger W. Ferguson as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
